20110105223344.000|20110105223346.000|CC1|OF DIABETIC KETOACIDOSIS.       
20110105223346.000|20110105223346.000|CC1|ONGLYZA HAS NOT BEEN STUDIED    
20110105223346.000|20110105223349.000|CC1|WITH INSULIN.                   
20110105223349.000|20110105223349.000|CC1|USING ONGLYZA WITH MEDICINES    
20110105223349.000|20110105223351.000|CC1|SUCH AS SULFONYLUREAS           
20110105223351.000|20110105223353.000|CC1|MAY CAUSE LOW BLOOD SUGAR.      
20110105223353.000|20110105223353.000|CC1|SOME SYMPTOMS OF LOW BLOOD      
20110105223353.000|20110105223355.000|CC1|SUGAR ARE SHAKING,              
20110105223355.000|20110105223357.000|CC1|SWEATING AND RAPID HEARTBEAT.   
20110105223357.000|20110105223357.000|CC1|CALL YOUR DOCTOR IF YOU HAVE    
20110105223357.000|20110105223359.000|CC1|AN ALLERGIC REACTION LIKE RASH, 
20110105223359.000|20110105223359.000|CC1|HIVES OR SWELLING OF THE FACE,  
20110105223359.000|20110105223402.000|CC1|MOUTH OR THROAT.                
20110105223402.000|20110105223402.000|CC1|ASK YOUR DOCTOR                 
20110105223402.000|20110105223405.000|CC1|IF YOU ALSO TAKE A TZD          
20110105223405.000|20110105223405.000|CC1|AS SWELLING IN THE HANDS,       
20110105223405.000|20110105223407.000|CC1|FEET OR ANKLES MAY WORSEN.      
20110105223407.000|20110105223407.000|CC1|BLOOD TESTS WILL CHECK          
20110105223407.000|20110105223410.000|CC1|FOR KIDNEY PROBLEMS.
